title: Stage S21
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I were you, I would talk to my boss about it.
If I were in your shoes, I would accept the offer.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 제가 당신이라면 상사와 그것에 대해 이야기할 거예요.
sentences.en: If I were you, I would talk to my boss about it.

sentences.kr: 제가 당신 입장이라면 그 제안을 받아들일 거예요.
sentences.en: If I were in your shoes, I would accept the offer.

sentences.kr: 먼저 더 많은 경험을 쌓으시길 제안해요.
sentences.en: I would suggest that you get more experience first.

sentences.kr: 다른 방법을 시도해보시는 게 어때요?
sentences.en: Why don't you try a different approach?

sentences.kr: 모든 선택사항을 고려해보시는 게 좋을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: You might want to consider all the options.

sentences.kr: 도움을 요청하는 것을 생각해보셨나요?
sentences.en: Have you thought about asking for help?

sentences.kr: 조금 더 기다리는 것이 좋은 생각일 것 같아요.
sentences.en: It might be a good idea to wait a little longer.

sentences.kr: 모든 것을 다시 한 번 확인하시길 권해요.
sentences.en: I'd recommend that you double-check everything.

sentences.kr: 아마도 결정을 다시 생각해보셔야 할 것 같아요.
sentences.en: Perhaps you should reconsider your decision.

sentences.kr: 완전히 다른 전략을 시도해보면 어떨까요?
sentences.en: What if you tried a completely different strategy?
